item.title: Sharing for Screentime
item.description: Sharing for Screentime Mission Empower individuals to live a more productive lifestyle through social awareness Problem No de-facto standard for sharing and competing against others regarding screen-time metrics Analytics are not geared toward individuals for better performance No use of social competitiveness for analytics-driven lifeops Solution Social awareness driven platform for better performance Rankings to get the most performance out of yourself Compete with others to “conquer the day” through analytics and insight
